description:
Nagisa, Honoka, the lacrosse team and the science club are still stranded up on the mountains with no power and no telephone to call for help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La batalla final, Pretty Cure Vs. Irukubo
The Showdown! Pretty Cure vs. Ilkubo
ศึกตัดสิน พริตตี้เคียวปะทะอิลคูโบ
決戦! プリキュア対イルクーボ
